perturbation.original_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Affiliate
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Northern California Chapter' is replaced with 'Northern California Affiliate'. This creates confusion as 'Northern California Affiliate' is not defined anywhere else in the agreement. It is now unclear whether the 'Northern California Chapter' and the 'Northern California Affiliate' refer to the same entity, potentially creating confusion about which entity is entitled to the donation.
